column4: I have a text file on my desktop,  but whenever I click to open it, a window pops up asking if i want to run the file or open it.  How can I stop this annoying box?
yeah its a linux thing, change in properties
what properties where?
are you on windows?
ubuntu
so if you set file of that type to open with something, it probably wont ask you again
so otherwise it opens with terminal or can run if its a script etc
i did, but its still asking
fixed
yeah i told u its there
no u didnt say to unselect "execute" lol
quake live, nexuiz , open arena , alien arena
i gave you the names already , did you see
sorry missed it
quake live, nexuiz , open arena , alien arena
except quake live all are in synaptic
ubuntu software center\
ok
if you encrypt home , ill let you know its not easy to recover if something goes wrong
